attributes.additional_details: CISPA is a law that has been brought before senate in the US to take information from our computers and pass them on to the government. This invades mine, yours and everybody else's privacy online. How can reposting a link generated by the Internet be classed as copyright enfringement? This is what this law does, we need to stop it. SOPA, PIPA & ACTA may be dead but CISPA is our new threat.
